price: 12. Y solo lo desmienten los transgresores pecadores.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
